TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowEnvironment extends System.Object
public ref class WorkflowEnvironment abstract sealed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示正在当前线程中运行的工作流实例的事务环境。

span.span: Represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 表示正在当前线程中运行的工作流实例的事务环境。The represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread. 有两个属性，一个是 属性，它通过将 项添加到此属性，公开当前工作批次并允许宿主或宿主服务参与当前事务；另一个是 属性，它公开当前正在此线程中运行的工作流实例的 。 has two properties: the property, which exposes the current work batch and allows a host or a host service to participate in the current transaction by adding items to this property; and the property, which exposes the of the workflow instance currently running on this thread.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WorkBatch As IWorkBatch
public: static property System::Workflow::Runtime::IWorkBatch ^ WorkBatch { System::Workflow::Runtime::IWorkBatch ^ get(); };

span.span: The that represents the current work batch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许宿主或宿主服务通过将挂起的工作项添加到当前工作批次来参与当前事务。The property allows hosts or host services to participate in the current transaction by adding pending work items to the current work batch. 希望参与当前事务的宿主或宿主服务必须实现 接口，并使用 将挂起的工作项添加到 。A host or a host service that wants to participate in the current transaction must implement the interface and use to add pending work items to . 持久服务应将各项添加到 ，以使其数据存储区的状态与工作流实例的状态保持一致。Durable services should add items to to keep the state of their data stores consistent with the state of the workflow instance. 和 这两个现成可用的持久服务都可实现此功能。The out-of-box durable services, and , both implement this functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WorkflowInstanceId As Guid
public: static property Guid WorkflowInstanceId { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前线程关联的工作流实例的 。

span.span: Gets the of the workflow instance associated with the current thread.

value.span: 用于标识当前工作流实例的 。

span.span: The that identifies the current workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含当前正在此线程中运行的工作流实例的 。 contains the of the workflow instance currently running in this thread. 只要从工作流线程中运行代码，您都可以通过 属性获取工作流实例的 。Whenever code is run from within a workflow thread, you can get the of the workflow instance through the property. 例如，如果您的代码位于某个活动所调用的服务中， 将会为该调用活动提供工作流实例的 。For example, if your code is in a service called by an activity, will provide of the workflow instance for the calling activity.
